title: Díra ve zdi
content:
Díra ve zdi je de facto západní brána Staré Wyzimy. Vede do oblasti zvané Hřbitov v bažinách a táke na Staré hradiště. It is not easily attained. Geralt must fight his way there from polní nemocnice regardless of his volba strany. The only differences being the sort of opponents he meets along the way and the placement of the barricades in his path.

Two individuals who can reliably be found in the vicinity are the kormidelník Řádu, merchant a Jean-Pierre. The quartermaster doesn't buy much, if anything, but he does sell an interesting variety of weapons.

Úkoly
Bláto a samet
Chuť pomsty
Hořící naděje
Očistný plamen
Pod ohnivým nebem
Zakázka: bruxy
Zbroj
